How it works

Three linked systems so you are first in line when good permits hit LADBS

System 1 - Live Permit Radar

1) Live Permit Radar

We watch LADBS in real time and filter by trade, value, and keywords (roof, reroof, solar, TPO...). You pick ZIPs.

Example: Every new roof permit in 90022, 90023, 90063 over $12k, tagged daily.

System 2 - Qualified Outreach

2) Qualified Outreach

We enrich owner/GC contacts and run Spanish-first multi-channel campaigns (calls, SMS, email). Human + compliant AI.

You stay visible to owners and GCs while competitors are still refreshing the city portal.

System 3 - AI That Closes

3) AI That Closes

24/7 phone & chat answer FAQs, capture jobs and book estimates straight to your calendar.

You wake up to booked jobs instead of missed calls.

Everything is tuned for LA contractors and built to scale into the LA 2028 and World Cup work surge.

Live from LADBS

Real permits. Updated every few hours. Open full radar.

Our Outcome Guarantee

If we do not help you close 1-2 qualified jobs in the first 30-60 days, you get a full refund or a free month - your choice.

  • We do the work - no software to learn
  • Qualified lists from live LADBS permits daily
  • Spanish-first outreach when it wins
  • 24/7 AI phone & chat that books appointments
Talk to a human hello@getpermitpulse.com

FAQ

What if we do not get results?

You pick refund or free month - no hoops.

Is outreach compliant?

Yes. We follow TCPA and local rules with clear consent flows, quiet hours, and one-click opt-outs.

Do you work in Spanish?

Yes, native LA Spanish + English.

How fast can we start?

We can usually launch in 7 days once we pick ZIPs and trade focus.

Do I keep the data?

Yes. Any lists, permit exports, and CRM notes we build for you are yours.
